title: I will never get a pbe

replies.body:
When we select PBE testers, we typically look for *really active* players who are a positive influence on the community. The length of time you've waited to get in does not directly affect your acceptance. 

Check out our [PBE FAQ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751904-Public-Beta-Environment-FAQ#top) for additional details. Let me know if you have any questions.
